_source.short_desc: 800response provides a comprehensive and affordable SaaS lead generation, lead tracking, and interactions analytics software solution.
_source.long_desc:
Lead Generation, Tracking & Customer Data Capture:
800response provides a comprehensive lead generation, lead tracking, and interactions analytics SaaS software solution to manage top-of-the-funnel lead generating practices, and allows for focused tracking and targeted nurturing of these valuable leads with customer profile data and interaction analytics.
_source.target_audience: We work with small to medium size businesses, multi-location companies, as well as franchise systems across a wide range of industries like automotive, home improvement, education, healthcare and more

category_features.name: Business Card/Badge Scanning
category_features.definition: Capture contact information by scanning a physical item and having the system automatically extract data from the scan

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Route and distribute your leads to third party buyers

category_features.name: Lead Notifications
category_features.definition: Receive an alert when new lead comes in

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Identify which leads fit your target audience and are most likely to become customers

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Online Forms
category_features.definition: Create new forms or from templates to help with creation of transactional content

related_products.short_desc: Fuel your go-to-market strategy, drive hot leads into your pipeline and convert them into deals with Pipedrive's smart sales tool.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a smart sales tool that combines cutting-edge technology, inside sales knowledge and public resources to capture leads and fuel your go-to-market strategy. Let our state-of-the-art features and add-ons, including Leads Inbox and LeadBooster, help you track opportunities that meet your target audience. Then, follow up and qualify them from one place to prioritize your biggest catch. Try Pipedrive free! No CC required!

related_products.short_desc: Twilio SendGrid is the leading cloud-based email delivery platform, trusted by over 80,000 of the world's fastest-growing brands.
related_products.features:
Twilio SendGrid is a leader in customer communications. Our trusted, cloud-based email delivery platform helps marketers and developers send with confidence. We are trusted by over 80,000 global customers, big and small, to drive engagement and growth through their email program.

In addition to our award-winning API, Twilio SendGrid's Marketing Campaigns offers powerful, one-to-many sending, straightforward segmentation, flexible and frustration-free campaign editing and actionable analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Lead capture that's both personal and automated: Typeform lets you do it in style with beautiful, interactive forms.
related_products.features: Captivate your leads with a unique, beautiful form. Typeform's sleek and responsive interface makes lead capture feel more like a friendly chat. Choose from thousands of images and videos, or customize it to your brand. Over 120 integrations to your favorite apps let you send leads' data automatically to your CRM or wherever you need it, and it's all protected with enterprise-level security.

related_products.short_desc: Need free lead capturing software and CRM in one? Bitrix24 is here to help. We capture leads automatically, regardless where they from.
related_products.features: Need free lead capturing software and CRM in one? Bitrix24 is here to help. We capture leads automatically, regardless where they from. Once the lead is captured by Bitrix24, you can use lead management, lead qualification, lead distribution, email marketing, quotes, invoices and other sales automation tools available to you at no charge (Bitrix24 comes with over 35 free tools).

related_products.short_desc: Freshsales is packed with features and a highly intuitive UI so that you don't have to juggle multiple tools to run your business.
related_products.features: Freshsales is a full-fledged sales force automation solution for sales teams. It provides everything a salesperson needs to- attract quality leads, engage in contextual conversations, drive deals with AI-powered insights, and nurture customer relationships. With built-in email, phone, chat, and telephony, Freshsales empowers sales teams with more time for selling by automating the sales process and increases efficiency and productivity in their daily activities.

related_products.short_desc: An easy to use CRM that helps you work smarter by managing and tracking your sales leads and customers.
related_products.features: Our CRM and lead capture software lets you effectively manage and track every sales opportunity through each stage of your pipeline to closure. Capturing leads from your website and automating the follow-up, our integrated system successfully brings together your sales and marketing in a centralized hub for great customer relationships and productive team collaboration. But what sets us apart is our exceptional customer service - we'll go the extra mile to help you get the most from your system.

related_products.short_desc: Capture leads from any source, or directly from your website with monday sales CRM's customizable embedded forms.
related_products.features: monday sales CRM helps you efficiently manage all your leads, customer relationships, sales pipeline, and tasks in one place so you can focus on closing more deals. With monday.com you can capture leads directly from your website by embedding your customizable form from monday.com onto your website, and all the submissions from your website will be collected directly into your CRM.

related_products.short_desc: Lusha is an all-in-one sales intelligence solution that helps you prospect at scale and speed up sales with less work.
related_products.features:
Lusha is a sales intelligence platform that helps you speed up your sales cycle with zero effort. ?Our unrivaled and compliant B2B data is trusted by over 1M users.

Lusha Prospecting Platform lets you prospect at massive scale for faster outreach. Pull up millions of verified emails and numbers on the right decision makers in a few clicks.

Lusha Extension makes it easy to laser-target any prospect anywhere online: LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Recruiter, company sites, Salesforce and HubSpot.??

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing and sales CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Use EngageBay's online web form builder to capture leads for every business. Capture leads directly from your website using our inline forms. Pick from any pre-configured form styles and customize them or create a custom one. - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: Apollo is the platform for your entire end-to-end sales strategy.
related_products.features:
Apollo is an all-in-one sales intelligence platform with tools to help you prospect, engage, and drive more revenue. Sellers and marketers use Apollo to discover more customers in market, connect with contacts, and establish a modern go-to-market strategy.

Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a leading data intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by over 10,000 customers, from rapidly growing startups to global enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that helps businesses improve marketing operations with database management, task assignment and more.
related_products.features: ZoomInfo combines the worlds most comprehensive business database with best-in-class technology to fuel your go-to-market strategy from start to finish, and provide an accurate, 360-degree view of customers, prospects, and opportunities.

similar_products.short_desc: Expo Logic is a collection of onsite event tech products that help event planners organize the basic logistics of their event.
similar_products.features: Expo Logic is a collection of onsite event technology products that help event administrators and planners organize the basic logistics of their event. We offer products for online registration, onsite event check-in, attendee tracking and expo management. This includes onsite badge printing, lead retrieval, floorplan management, data insights and more. Expo Logic creates a seamless experience with comprehensive event management products from a single partner.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that helps businesses improve marketing operations with database management, task assignment and more.
similar_products.features: ZoomInfo combines the worlds most comprehensive business database with best-in-class technology to fuel your go-to-market strategy from start to finish, and provide an accurate, 360-degree view of customers, prospects, and opportunities.

similar_products.short_desc: Lusha is an all-in-one sales intelligence solution that helps you prospect at scale and speed up sales with less work.
similar_products.features:
Lusha is a sales intelligence platform that helps you speed up your sales cycle with zero effort. ?Our unrivaled and compliant B2B data is trusted by over 1M users.

Lusha Prospecting Platform lets you prospect at massive scale for faster outreach. Pull up millions of verified emails and numbers on the right decision makers in a few clicks.

Lusha Extension makes it easy to laser-target any prospect anywhere online: LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Recruiter, company sites, Salesforce and HubSpot.??

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based popup builder that helps create floating popup bars, provide custom fonts, track audience, and more.
similar_products.features:
Popupfox is a no-code popup builder fully compatible with Shopify. Has conversion-optimized popups and over 70 templates. You can segment, target, and track audiences, create campaign announcements and email forms, and personalize your popups just in 2 minutes with Popupfox.

Build your popups and forms in 2 minutes with Popupfox.

*** Compatible to all kind of web pages.

similar_products.short_desc: Capture leads from any source, or directly from your website with monday sales CRM's customizable embedded forms.
similar_products.features: monday sales CRM helps you efficiently manage all your leads, customer relationships, sales pipeline, and tasks in one place so you can focus on closing more deals. With monday.com you can capture leads directly from your website by embedding your customizable form from monday.com onto your website, and all the submissions from your website will be collected directly into your CRM.

similar_products.short_desc: Super-charge your lead generation with interactive videos.
similar_products.features: Harness the power of video to help capture and convert leads. VideoAsk lets you do face-to-face lead generation, at scale and with ease. Create personalised funnels with pre-recorded videos and let your leads self segment. Plus there are text and audio options when video isn't possible, as well as multiple choice, meeting scheduling, payment options, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Accelevents is an all-in-one events platform that empowers you to expand your reach and drive sustainable growth.
similar_products.features:
Accelevents is an all-in-one event management platform for in-person, virtual & hybrid events. Built to save you time and frustration while delivering measurable results for your organization. 

As a leading event technology platform, Accelevents is redefining the way brands connect with their audiences with a user-friendly yet robust set of customizable and interactive features.

similar_products.short_desc: SalesIntel helps sales & marketing teams generate qualified leads with accurate contacts, technographic, firmographic and intent data.
similar_products.features:
We're the business intelligence platform that helps sales and marketing teams easily identify and target high intent accounts with human-verified contact data. 

We provide B2B intelligence using proprietary data and our unique combination of automation & human research allows us to reach an industry leading 95% data accuracy. 

Additionally, we provide research-on-demand for your niche market and our research team will work with you to find your ICP and build a custom list.

similar_products.short_desc: Sleeknote has everything you need-popups, forms, sidebars, slide-ins, gamification-to collect leads on your website (in a few clicks)
similar_products.features:
Most lead capture forms target only new website visitors. Whether you're visiting a website for the first time or returning as an email subscriber, you see the same generic form asking you for an email you gave on a previous visit. 

Sleeknote makes it easy to customize forms for each visitor, regardless of where they are in their journey. Ask a new visitor to leave their name & email. Then, when they return as a subscriber, invite them to leave a review or more. 

The possibilities are endless.

similar_products.short_desc: The only choice for comprehensive sales enablement.
similar_products.features: SalesRabbit's game-changing methodology is based on research they've done with sales pros and the top teams in the industry. It targets the main traction points of every successful organization: rep motivation, team efficiency, and sales mastery. The app is built to help your company make changes that enable peak performance at every door. Their dedicated CSMs and support staff work with you to implement these strategies, ensuring you get the results every door-to-door company hopes for.

similar_products.short_desc: Since 1995, we have provided event technology solutions and world-class service to the conference and tradeshow industry.
similar_products.features: Since 1995, we've provided the conference and tradeshow industry with innovative technologies designed to improve and simplify every event. With unrivaled customer support, global reach, and an eye on innovative technologies, we have powered over 12,000 events around the world.  In an industry of DIY platforms, we stand apart as a full service, white-glove solution when it is needed and do-it-yourself event technology when you do not.

similar_products.short_desc: Lead capture that's both personal and automated: Typeform lets you do it in style with beautiful, interactive forms.
similar_products.features: Captivate your leads with a unique, beautiful form. Typeform's sleek and responsive interface makes lead capture feel more like a friendly chat. Choose from thousands of images and videos, or customize it to your brand. Over 120 integrations to your favorite apps let you send leads' data automatically to your CRM or wherever you need it, and it's all protected with enterprise-level security.

similar_products.short_desc: Capture more leads with sign-up forms and landing pages. Beautiful templates and the drag-and-drop builder make it easy to get started.
similar_products.features:
All-in-on marketing solution. Capture more leads with a custom-built sign-up form and landing page. 

You'll get unlimited landing pages and sign-up forms, plus it's easy to get started with pre-built templates and free stock images. 

AWeber is the perfect choice for people looking to capture more leads, make more sales, and increase brand awareness. For 20 years, over one million customers have trusted AWeber. People also love the low, predictable pricing structure.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Conference software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Conference tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Conference software automates promotion, registration, and organization of live or online conferences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Extraction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Extraction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Extraction software allows organizations to collect information from websites, PDF files, and text files on local disks. The kind of information that can be extracted ranges from text to images and content summaries. Data Extraction software can often organize extracted data into a formatted Word document or an Excel table. For related solutions see Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Data Capture software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Data Capture tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Data Capture software collects information from documents and the internet and feeds it into appropriate business applications for further analysis. This software significantly reduces costs and saves time for professionals conducting research. Electronic Data Capture software is often used in Clinical Trial Management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Landing Page software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Landing Page tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Landing Page software helps marketers increase conversions and identify the most effective messaging with A/B testing. Most Landing Page software integrates with many of the marketing tools you use everyday, like email automation, CRM, and web analytics. Usually, no coding experience is required to build your own landing pages. Email Marketing software, Lead Management software, Marketing Automation software, Sales Enablement software, and SMS (Text) Marketing software are closely related to Landing Page software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Generation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Generation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Generation software helps sales personnel identify prospective customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telemarketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telemarketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telemarketing software automates customer outreach functions for sales and marketing call centers.

_source.short_desc: Get 25-50% more inbound leads with local, toll-free, and vanity phone numbers from 800response.
_source.long_desc: Attract and qualify new leads and drive revenue with the industry?s leading call tracking and customer analytics provider. 800response helps businesses attract & convert leads, optimize new customer acquisitions, measure and track campaign performance, and monitor the customer experience. provides local and toll-free tracking numbers, including vanity 800 numbers, so that you can route, track, and analyze every incoming call.
_source.target_audience: We work with small to medium size businesses, multi-location companies, as well as franchise systems across a wide range of industries like automotive, home improvement, education, healthcare and more

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Import and export information and reports to and from the program

category_features.name: Lead Capture
category_features.definition: Automatically identify and save contact information for potential customers

category_features.name: Lead Database Integration
category_features.definition: A repository of verified contact information that is provided by software vendor. Software functionality is offered on top of this data

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Lead Segmentation
category_features.definition: Divide leads into buckets based on predefined criteria and routing rules

category_features.name: Lead Verification/Validation
category_features.definition: Ensure the authenticity of each lead by verifying their information, eliminating duplicate leads/contacts, etc.

category_features.name: Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

category_features.name: Ad hoc Reporting
category_features.definition: Generate reports that meet information requirement, as the occasion requires

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Key Performance Indicators
category_features.definition: Important metrics on which company is evaluated

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Profitability Analysis
category_features.definition: Evaluate the degree to which business operations bring monetary gains

category_features.name: Publishing / Sharing
category_features.definition: Share pre-configured sets of data organized and presented in a specific manner with the organization

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

category_features.name: Strategic Planning
category_features.definition: At a high level, visualize a preferred outcome, define goals and identify specific steps to achieve them

category_features.name: Trend / Problem Indicators
category_features.definition: Visually identify direction of development and areas that require attention

category_features.name: Visual Analytics
category_features.definition: Interact with data visualization elements, such as charts and graphs, to drill down into data

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Store call recordings into a more compressed form, usually in a separate location

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Allow businesses to monitor calls over multiple locations on different networks

category_features.definition: Highlight specific time marks for annotation and review purposes

category_features.name: Event Triggered Actions
category_features.definition: Record calls based on customer behavior

category_features.name: File Transfer
category_features.definition: Secure file sharing between multiple endpoints

category_features.name: On-Demand Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Recording
category_features.definition: Record live calls to play later

category_features.name: Scheduled Recording
category_features.definition: Automatically record calls at predetermined times

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Call Routing
category_features.definition: The procedure of sending voice calls to a specific queue based on predetermined criteria

category_features.name: Call Tracking Metrics
category_features.definition: Measure campaign influence through collection of keyword tracking and revenue sources

category_features.name: Caller ID
category_features.definition: Identify the number and contact information of a caller before answering the phone

category_features.name: Conversion Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor conversion rates and analyze effectiveness and profitability of marketing efforts

category_features.name: IVR / Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Recognize/detect varying frequencies in a person?s voice to identify/verify "who" is speaking

category_features.name: Keyword Tracking
category_features.definition: The activity of gathering data based on keywords used on phonecalls and online.

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Drip Campaigns
category_features.definition: Create a path to complete a specific goal and guide leads based on the time between actions

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers organizations with a complete customer relationship lifecycle management solution.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers organizations with a complete customer relationship lifecycle management solution for managing organization-wide Sales, Marketing, Customer Support & Service and Inventory Management in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
related_products.features: HubSpot provides an all-in-one platform of tools to help businesses generate more leads for their business. Forms, landing pages, email marketing, SEO tools, social media marketing, blogging -- it's all available in the software so you can generate leads and grow your business. Plus, analytics tools are baked right in, so you can measure and continually improve your lead generation efforts. Sign up for free, and enjoy the benefits of using all-in-one lead generation software.

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is a smart sales tool to help you generate hot leads, engage with them and convert them from one place.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a smart sales tool that combines cutting-edge technology, inside sales knowledge and public resources to generate hot leads and fuel your go-to-market strategy. Let our state-of-the-art features, including Leads Inbox, Web Forms and Chatbot, help you track prospects and engage with them at the right time. Then, follow up and qualify them from one place to prioritize your biggest catch. Try Pipedrive free! No CC required!

related_products.short_desc: 130,000+ customers in 170 countries use ActiveCampaign to automate their marketing, from contact management to email personalization.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's category-defining customer experience automation platform (CXA) helps over 130,000 businesses in 170 countries meaningfully engage with their customers. The platform gives businesses of all sizes access to 500+ pre-built automations that combine email marketing, marketing automation and CRM for powerful segmentation and personalization across social, email, messaging, chat and text. Over 75% of ActiveCampaign's customers use its 850+ integrations.

related_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
related_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
related_products.features: Adobe Marketo Engage is as a centralized marketing hub for orchestration and execution of cross channel campaigns to acquire, engage, nurture, expand and retain customers, throughout complex buying journeys. Marketo Engage facilitates alignment between marketing and sales team to drive revenue and growth for the organization, with efficiency at scale.

related_products.short_desc: Pardot, a Salesforce company, is an easy-to-use B2B marketing automation suite that helps sales & marketing maximize efficiency.
related_products.features: Pardots comprehensive Lead Management solution provides all the tools your sales team needs to efficiently nurture and manage prospects. Using Pardot marketing automation, you can automate lead scoring and grading, place prospects on relevant drip campaigns, and view and track all prospect activity on your site. Accelerate pipeline, drive revenue, and align marketing and sales with Pardot marketing automation. Measure the true ROI of your marketing efforts with closed-loop reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Pardot, a Salesforce company, is an easy-to-use B2B marketing automation suite that helps sales & marketing maximize efficiency.
related_products.features: Pardots comprehensive Lead Management solution provides all the tools your sales team needs to efficiently nurture and manage prospects. Using Pardot marketing automation, you can automate lead scoring and grading, place prospects on relevant drip campaigns, and view and track all prospect activity on your site. Accelerate pipeline, drive revenue, and align marketing and sales with Pardot marketing automation. Measure the true ROI of your marketing efforts with closed-loop reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Make lead generation more personal, without sacrificing scale. Typeforms are interactive and customizable with over 120 integrations.
related_products.features: Impress leads from the get-go with a beautiful, interactive form that's a pleasure to complete. Let leads self-segment using Typeform's responsive logic or generate lead scores with our Calculator, so you can capture the most qualified leads automatically. 120+ integrations let you hook up Typeform to your CRM or wherever you want to send your data. Sound complex? It's not! Typeform is super easy to use, no coding required.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free CRM with lead generation tools used by 4 million companies worldwide.
related_products.features: If you are looking for a free CRM with lead generation and management tools, Bitrix24 is exactly what you need. Bitrix24 captures leads from email, web forms, messengers, social networks, Facebook, Instagram, Skype and other channels. Used by over 8 million companies worldwide, available in cloud and on-premise with open source code access, Bitrix24 is a #1 free CRM.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM's Lead Generation Software helps capture, nurture, qualify and convert more leads. Maximize the return on your prospecting and demand generation efforts. Landing Pages, forms, website Pop-Ups, email finder, telephone prospecting, marketing automation, segment leads, and personalized lead generation.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based solution that helps businesses improve marketing operations with database management, task assignment and more.
similar_products.features: ZoomInfo combines the worlds most comprehensive business database with best-in-class technology to fuel your go-to-market strategy from start to finish, and provide an accurate, 360-degree view of customers, prospects, and opportunities.

similar_products.short_desc: Slintel has a growing database of 286M Leads, 30K Technologies Across 14.5M Companies. Get Intent Based B2B Leads & find active buyers
similar_products.features:
Slintel, the leader in B2B Lead Generation has driven hypergrowth for thousands of customers. Get information on decision makers with high intent to buy your solutions. Personalize your pitches by having access to:

 Verified Leads | Buyer Intent Scores | Technographics & Firmographics | Psychographics | Effortless Lead Enrichment.

A Sales Intelligence Platform that provides high accuracy B2B leads & thematic Buyer Intent to help sell better. Find your next customer. Prospect, Engage & Close

similar_products.short_desc: Lusha is an all-in-one sales intelligence solution that helps you prospect at scale and speed up sales with less work.
similar_products.features:
Lusha is a sales intelligence platform that helps you speed up your sales cycle with zero effort. ?Our unrivaled and compliant B2B data is trusted by over 1M users.

Lusha Prospecting Platform lets you prospect at massive scale for faster outreach. Pull up millions of verified emails and numbers on the right decision makers in a few clicks.

Lusha Extension makes it easy to laser-target any prospect anywhere online: LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Recruiter, company sites, Salesforce and HubSpot.??

similar_products.short_desc: Pardot, a Salesforce company, is an easy-to-use B2B marketing automation suite that helps sales & marketing maximize efficiency.
similar_products.features: Pardots comprehensive Lead Management solution provides all the tools your sales team needs to efficiently nurture and manage prospects. Using Pardot marketing automation, you can automate lead scoring and grading, place prospects on relevant drip campaigns, and view and track all prospect activity on your site. Accelerate pipeline, drive revenue, and align marketing and sales with Pardot marketing automation. Measure the true ROI of your marketing efforts with closed-loop reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is a smart sales tool to help you generate hot leads, engage with them and convert them from one place.
similar_products.features: Pipedrive is a smart sales tool that combines cutting-edge technology, inside sales knowledge and public resources to generate hot leads and fuel your go-to-market strategy. Let our state-of-the-art features, including Leads Inbox, Web Forms and Chatbot, help you track prospects and engage with them at the right time. Then, follow up and qualify them from one place to prioritize your biggest catch. Try Pipedrive free! No CC required!

similar_products.short_desc: Real-time AI-powered Lead Generation tool. Quicken your list building, shorten your sales cycle, and increase accuracy in prospecting!
similar_products.features: Advanced-tech lead generation platform powered by Artificial Intelligence! Revolutionary real-time search engine for direct access to B2B Decision Makers. Now sales pros can build contact lists in minutes, not hours. Unlike our competitors' stale, static databases, Seamless.AI differentiates with unique tech to aggregate and update accurate contact lists in real-time, as our users browse target account websites. Get 50 Free Lead Credits with New Signup or Request a 1-1 Demo with our sales team!

similar_products.short_desc: Leader in premium sales intelligence
similar_products.features:
Cognism is a leader in international sales intelligence, setting a new standard for data quality and compliance, trusted by 1000+ revenue teams worldwide. 

Cognism helps businesses find, engage and close their dream prospects by providing premium company and contact information, including firmographics, technographics, sales trigger events, intent data, verified business emails and phone-verified mobile numbers.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.

Marketo Engage facilitates alignment between marketing and sales team to drive revenue and growth for the organization, with efficiency at scale.

similar_products.short_desc: SalesIntel helps you accelerate lead conversions, maximize outreach, and build a stronger pipeline with human-verified contact data.
similar_products.features:
SalesIntel is the B2B intelligence platform that gives marketing and sales teams the tools they need to exceed inbound goals and fill their pipeline. 

We provide B2B intelligence using proprietary data and  patented AI technology and we have the largest database of mobile and direct-dial phone numbers, an industry-leading 95% accuracy rate, and on-demand research to find customized data that their customers need.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Chili Piper is the most advanced routing and booking software, fueling high-growth B2B revenue teams.
similar_products.features:
Chili Piper is the leading inbound conversion platform fueling today's high-growth B2B teams. Its advanced routing and booking software enables fast speed to lead and efficient handoff, making it possible for sales and marketing teams to book meetings instantly and generate more revenue while spending less. 

Companies like Intuit, Twilio, Forrester, Spotify, and Gong use Chili Piper to double their inbound conversion rates and maximize revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
similar_products.features: HubSpot provides an all-in-one platform of tools to help businesses generate more leads for their business. Forms, landing pages, email marketing, SEO tools, social media marketing, blogging -- it's all available in the software so you can generate leads and grow your business. Plus, analytics tools are baked right in, so you can measure and continually improve your lead generation efforts. Sign up for free, and enjoy the benefits of using all-in-one lead generation software.

similar_products.short_desc: Salesflow is a LinkedIn Automation tool for Sales Teams, Agencies and Growing startups. A fast & cost-efficient way to generate leads!
similar_products.features:

Salesflow helps users to consistently & predictably generate results month in, month out.  Making it faster, easier and more effective to book meetings with decision-makers.? 

We power over 6,000+ users & 300+ agency partners in generating over 500K+ in new leads & opportunities!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Account Based Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Account Based Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Account Based Marketing software promotes revenue growth by helping businesses focus its marketing efforts on the key target audience. This software can track and encourage buying intent by delivering personalized marketing content to prospective customers at the time when they are most likely to convert.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Referral software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Referral tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Referral software helps companies promote their service more effectively by using their customer base as a source for additional sales leads. Typical features of this software include referral tracking, reward distribution and testimonial management. Specific kinds of Referral software are targeted toward Human Resource departments and help establish employee referral programs and lower an organization's cost-per-hire. For related software solutions see Marketing Automation software, Lead Management software, Human Resource software and Customer Reference Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.
